issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: MobileWeb : JSON.stringify is giving error on event objects

comments.body: Duplicate of TIMOB-10424. Unfortunately the architecture of Mobile Web and the lack of proxies like the other platforms have prevent us from being able to fix this issue.
